WorkRewardFund.name: WorkRewardFund
WorkRewardFund.description: Represents a Reward Fund and describes the Reward Fund attributes.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the WorkRewardFund is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The time stamp that indicates when the current user last viewed a record that is related to this WorkRewardFund.

LastViewedDate.description: The time stamp that indicates when the current user last viewed this WorkRewardFund. If this value is null, this record might have been only referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Required. Name of the Reward Fund.

OwnerId.description: Salesforce unique ID of User who is the Owner of the WorkRewardFund record.

RewardFundTypeId.description: Salesforce unique ID of the WorkRewardFundType that is associated with the WorkRewardFund.

TotalCodeCount.description: Total reward codes that are available in the WorkRewardFund. Derived from WorkReward records that are associated with the WorkRewardFund.

Type.description: RewardType of the WorkRewardFund. Default is Amazon.com.

UsedCodeCount.description: Total reward codes that are used in the WorkRewardFund. Derived from the total assigned WorkReward records that are associated with the WorkRewardFund.

Value.description: Value of each of the reward codes in the WorkRewardFund.
